translations: n.[仪]指针；指标（pointer 的复数）；指极星

phrs.translation: 激光教鞭，激光棒；雷射指示器
栈指针；栈指示器；堆栈指示字

sentences.sentence: Here are some pointers on how to go about the writing task.
sentences.translation: 关于这项写作任务，以下有几点建议。

sentences.sentence: I hope at least my daughter was able to offer you some useful pointers.
sentences.translation: 我希望至少我女儿能够给你提供一些有用的线索。
